message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending under $150. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $100 is too low for me.  Could we meet halfway at $115? It's a fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am still looking to keep my spending under $150. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $110?
